## Problem statement

What problem are you trying to solve?

## Proposed solution

Describe the feature clearly and concisely.

## Alternatives considered

List any alternatives or workarounds you considered.

## API / UX sketch

If relevant, include proposed props, emits, slots, usage examples, or UI behaviour.

## Backwards compatibility

- [ ] This is backwards compatible
- [ ] This may introduce a breaking change (requires discussion before implementation)

If potentially breaking, explain impact and migration path.

## Testing strategy

How should this be validated (unit tests, integration tests, visual checks)?

## Additional context

Anything else to help evaluate the request.
